resources.string: At first, click on the Contacts button
Second, click on the add sign, it will take you to the contacts
Third, choose the person you want to share your location with Note that these names and numbers are not real, just for clarification
Finally, send a message to this person to request their location Note that these names and numbers are not real, just for clarification
You will send a request via SMS to take a location
You will send your location via SMS to
Note: This person should add you
This app requires the location to run
Make sure you are connected to the internet and running the location or try again
This method takes your location from the satellite without the Internet, so it will be a little late
Failed to send the location make sure the site is working
There are no people I have added
